channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevart -- Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevart -- Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album

item.title: CVE-2024-30550|2024-03-31T19:57:44.039Z -- wpdevart -- Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31120|2024-03-31T18:48:30.646Z -- wpdevart -- Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wpdevart Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive Image Gallery, Gallery Album: from n/a through 2.0.3.
